name: Vulcan Boots

name: Vulcan Cuirass
description: Armor of Vulcan, the infamous Red Knight. It grants immunity from being burned.

name: Vulcan Helmet
description: Helmet of Vulcan, the infamous Red Knight. It grants immunity from being burned.

name: Vulcan's Brew
description: A strong tonic brewed by Vulcan of the Inferno Knights. Consume it to slightly raise experience and items dropped for a limited time.

name: Vulcan's Longsword
description: A seemingly flawless blade wielded by Vulcan, the Red Knight. Vulcan formed the Knights of Inferno to fight alongside the forces of Annwn.

description: Some magic users are also skilled in combat. This is the helmet of one.
